CustomField.formula:
IF( OR( CONTAINS(TEXT(Account.Industry), 'Accounting'), CONTAINS(TEXT(Account.Industry), 'Consulting') ), 'Natashia Gavarrete',
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Account.Industry ,'Legal'), OR( Account.Owner.UserRoleId="00E50000000sQmp", /*EMEA Sales*/ Account.Owner.UserRoleId="00E500000010Q8v" /*EMEA Sales Reps*/ ) ), 'Paul Talaga',
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Account.Industry ,'Legal'), OR( Account.Owner.UserRoleId="00E500000011cAL", /*NA Large Law / APAC Sales*/ Account.Owner.UserRoleId="00E500000011cAQ" /*NA Large Law / APAC Sales Reps*/ ), CONTAINS(Department, 'Marketing') ), 'Paul Talaga',
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Account.Industry ,'Legal'), OR( Account.Owner.UserRoleId="00E500000011cAL", /*NA Large Law / APAC Sales*/ Account.Owner.UserRoleId="00E500000011cAQ" /*NA Large Law / APAC Sales Reps*/ ), CONTAINS(Department, 'Risk') ), 'Holly Stirk',
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Account.Industry ,'Legal'), OR( Account.Owner.UserRoleId="00E500000011cAL", /*NA Large Law / APAC Sales*/ Account.Owner.UserRoleId="00E500000011cAQ", /*NA Large Law / APAC Sales Reps*/ Account.Owner.UserRoleId="00E500000011cAV", /*NA Mid-size Law Sales*/ Account.Owner.UserRoleId="00E500000011cAa" /*NA Mid-size Law Sales Reps*/ ), CONTAINS(Department, 'Operations') ), 'Rebecca Frazier', IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Account.Industry ,'Legal'), OR( Account.Owner.UserRoleId="00E500000011cAL", /*NA Large Law / APAC Sales*/ Account.Owner.UserRoleId="00E500000011cAQ", /*NA Large Law / APAC Sales Reps*/ Account.Owner.UserRoleId="00E500000011cAV", /*NA Mid-size Law Sales*/ Account.Owner.UserRoleId="00E500000011cAa" /*NA Mid-size Law Sales Reps*/ ), CONTAINS(Department, 'IT') ), 'Rebecca Frazier', IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Account.Industry ,'Legal'), OR( Account.Owner.UserRoleId="00E500000011cAL", /*NA Large Law / APAC Sales*/ Account.Owner.UserRoleId="00E500000011cAQ" /*NA Large Law / APAC Sales Reps*/ ), OR( CONTAINS(Department, 'Content'), CONTAINS(Department, 'IT'), CONTAINS(Department, 'Leaders') ) ), 'Paul Talaga', IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Account.Industry ,'Legal'), OR( Account.Owner.UserRoleId="00E500000011cAV", /*NA Mid-size Law Sales*/ Account.Owner.UserRoleId="00E500000011cAa" /*NA Mid-size Law Sales Reps*/ ), OR( CONTAINS(Department, 'Risk'), CONTAINS(Department, 'Marketing') ) ), 'Hunter Tate', 'Jeff Macomber' ))))))))
CustomField.label: CDA Owner
